content: उत्कृष् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To draw or pull up, raise or lift up; उदकर्षि <ls>Śi. 13. 60</ls>; to draw or take out, extract, extricate; अंगदकोटिलग्नं प्रालंबमुत्कृष्य <ls>R. 6. 14.</ls> {@--2@} To draw, attract; <ls>Ś. 17. 42.</ls> {@--3@} To pull or put off. {@--4@} To increase, enhance (<ab>opp.</ab> अपकृष्). {@--5@} To bend (as a bow). {@--6@} To tear asunder. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To elevate, raise, increase. {%--<ab>pass.</ab>%} {@--1@} To be lifted, raised. {@--2@} To rise, be supreme or eminent.
